document_data.mainbody:
endalars Fine Fruits was a trading coster located in the city of Archenbridge in the latter half of the 14 century DR. They would buy produce from local farms and orchards in Archendale and ship them to the large cities in Cormyr and Sembia.
The shop was name after its founder, but was later purchased by the merchant-mage Alduvar Snowbrand. Because Alduvar was secretly the Blue Sword, he often left the shop in the care of his business partner, Selni Ravenhair.
